title: The Covenant Confirmed
summary: Exodus 24 describes the formal confirmation of the covenant between God and Israel. The people agree to obey, sacrifices are made, and Moses goes up Mount Sinai, where he remains for forty days and nights.

faq.question: How was the covenant confirmed?
faq.answer: Through sacrifices, the sprinkling of blood, and the people’s declaration to obey all the Lord’s commands.

faq.question: Why did Moses go up the mountain?
faq.answer: To receive the stone tablets and further instructions from God.
